reviewText:
The only bigfoot seen here is Ivan's wife dressed in her own home made MONKEY SUIT.!! Laughable, fun, folksy film I will keep for years to enjoy. Ivan Marx meant well, he just lacked the footage of the real thing, but his passion pours out of this classic Big Foot film.

Snowbeast  ( the double feature add) is as bad as it sounds. I don't even remember it much as I was unable to get thru it.
Not crazy over legend of bigfoot. the casing is deceiving. no carry by any monster. i would not buy it again.
